message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $90 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
